features: ✅【From INIU--the SAFE Fast Charge Pro】Experience the safest charging with over 38 million global users. At INIU, we use only the highest-grade materials, so we do have the confidence to provide an industry-leading 3 years warranty.

✅【Market's Thinnest 10000mAh】 The market’s one and only 0.5-inch power bank that breaks the limit of 10000mAh, easily slipped into any travel lover's pockets or bag. Enjoy the days’ worth of charging capacity, enough to top up iPhone 8 3.6 times, Samsung S22 1.7 times, or AirPods Pro 13.2 times.
✅【Only 5% Got USB-C IN&OUT】INIU is the only 5% of power banks got a USB-C IN&OUT port. Unlike others only recharge via USB-C port, INIU can charge all devices with your USB-C cables directly.
✅【3A High-Speed Charging】3A fast charging fuels iPhone up to 78% in just one hour. INIU's AutoFit identifies and meets your device's ideal speed, charging double than 2.1A chargers.
✅【15-Layer SAFE Charging】INIU's unique 15-Layer SmartProtect system shrugs off any unusual charging at the start. Take overheating risk and battery damage away from your devices.

✅【What You Get】INIU 10000mAh portable charger*1, 0.3M/1ft USB-A to USB-C Cable*1, travel pouch*1, user manual*1, 30 days money-back guarantee, INIU industry-leading 3-year warranty and lifetime technical support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim and easy for travel
reviews.reviewText: We purchased our second INIU Portable Charger and it has quickly become an indispensable companion for the on-the-go lifestyle. From its sleek design to its powerful performance, this charger has exceeded my expectations.The compact and lightweight design makes it incredibly convenient to carry in my pocket or bag. It's the perfect size for travel, and I no longer worry about my phone running out of battery during long journeys or busy days. This became extremely helpful on my recent overseas trip. Never had to work about my iPhone running out of juice.The charging speed is impressive, delivering a quick and efficient charge to my devices. The 10000mAh capacity is more than enough to keep my phone charged multiple times, and the dual USB ports allow me to charge two devices simultaneously. This feature has been a game-changer allowing it to charge both my iPhone and iPad at the same time.I also appreciate the thoughtful design details, such as the LED indicator lights that accurately display the remaining battery power. It's a small touch, but it adds to the overall user experience and helps me plan when to recharge the power bank. Including a flashlight is a handy bonus, proving to be surprisingly useful in unexpected situations.Overall, I can't recommend the INIU Portable Charger enough. It's a reliable and stylish solution for anyone in need of a portable power bank. Whether you're a frequent traveler, a busy professional, or just someone who wants to ensure their devices are always charged, this charger is a wise investment. It's become an essential part of my daily carry, and I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size! Nice, smooth, soft, thin and not to wide and long. I love the paw charging light! Color choices are great as well! Charges great! Comes with a warranty as well, so that's a huge bonus. Great price for this charger, a great purchase all and all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a Gem In a Hurricane or Stuck in an Airport!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this charger. I have never used a portable power pack before, but bought this one as a hurricane was approaching three years ago. I guess I got lucky because this one has been a gem.If you know electronics, you can skip this, but if you are like me and figure things out as you go, here is what you need to know. You attach this with a cord to a wall outlet to charge it. You could use the included cord, although it is very short. Put the USB-C (smaller) end into the in/out port (hole), and then plug the larger end (called USB-A) into the square'ish block that is on the end of your telephone charging cord. Then plug that into the wall and this will power up your INIU portable charger. The little blue paw print will come on and you can watch it charge, from one light to five (fully charged). Mine never takes very long to charge, but it's never really drained. (I hear you should use most of the charge before recharging to maintain life of the charger, but I cannot control when a hurricane is coming, and that's usually when I charge it.)When you need to power your device, you will connect it to the charged INIU power pack. You will now use any of the OUT ports (holes) in on the INIU to connect the charger to your device. You might have to use the cord that comes with your phone to do this if your phone does not use a USB C plug. Simply detach that cord from the square box that you plug into the wall and put that end (USB A) into OUT 1 or OUT 2, and the other end into your phone. Your phone should now be charging from the power pack. The blue "Paw" lights will indicate that the power pack is in use and how much charge is left in it.If I have confused you, I promise it will make more sense to you when you actually do it. Remember the IN port is for electricity to come INto the INIU to charge the INIU. The OUT ports are for the INIU to send OUT power to your device. Be sure to do this BEFORE you desperately need it.I have dropped this multiple times, including on my garage floor, without damage. It is the size of my smart phone, but a tad thicker. It charges my phone fully twice before I need to charge the INIU power pack again. I assume you can also charge this in the USB port in your car, although anything I ever plug in there seems to take a long time to charge, so on the way to the airport might be a little late.This has saved me in power outages, but also in other circumstances. I was stuck in the Instanbul Airport with a massive amount of people and not a plug to be found. I was able to charge my USB powered sonic electric toothbrush with this when I forgot to charge the toothbrush at home. I gave one to my handicapped mother for her Kindle, in case she ran out of battery and did not want to fight getting up to plug the Kindle in.If all else fails, if you go to the ratings/comments/questions section for this item, you will find a user guide and manual hidden there. But since I did not understand the in/out and different kinds of USB plugs, I was lost for a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars [EDIT/UPDATE] Solid 4 Star Handy Little Power Bank and here is why...
reviews.reviewText: [Edit/Update as of October 19th, 2023] I used two different 5 volt 3 Amp USB C cables to compare the charge of that of the USB A to USB C cable that comes included with this power bank. One by Samsung that came with my s23 Ultra, and the other by JXMOX. I wasn't surprised at all do discover that they both delivered a minimum based fast charge that you would see from a PD charge below a 25w output.I would also like to add, the power bank does not have a IPX rating. It is not water resistant.I like the slim design and portability of this sleek little power bank. Came with a nice little traveler's bag to keep it from getting scratched or dinged in my backpack on my commute to work and back home. Although this powerbank doesn't support true Super Fast Charging, it still does support PD fast charging for my s23 Ultra. it's great for topping off my battery back to the max 85% I have set my s23 Ultra to max charge at. A neat feature that I started using after I purchased the device, and that will help in the longevity and overall health of my battery's lifetime. So this little fella makes for a great accessory to have. I also like the little built-in flashlight. Cool little added feature for finding things in the dark like my earbuds or a USB C or USB A cable. There are only two downsides. It doesn't support super fast charge for my device, and it takes a bit long to fully charge the power bank itself. I can live without its inability to super fast charge or fast charge, which I knew before purchasing it. I don't know of any super fast charge output power banks out there. I didn't find one while browsing here on Amazon. The power bank would require more mah voltage and wattage. Which would translate to a higher price. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and having the convenience knowing that if I need a little juice for my device or earbuds, I can just plug right into the power bank on the fly. Package also arrived in great condition as well as everything inside. No dings dents burrs spurs or cowboy's boots. Pleased with my purchase.

Le dura mucho la carga y no tarda mucho en cargar. Lo llegué incluso a utilizar para cargar mi computadora y funcionó muy bien. Es muy ligera y duradera, se me ha caído varias veces y no le pasa nada. Ya tengo 5 meses con ella y sigue funcionando igual.
Efficient, effective, compact, light, great for your backpack

Piaciuto le specifiche e il fatto che la consegna sia avvenuta entro un paio di giorni. Sono entusiasta della sua ricaricabilità e del fatto che possa essere utilizzato per qualsiasi dispositivo in suo possesso. Mi piace particolarmente l'impronta della zampa che mostra quanta carica è rimasta nel power bank, che è completamente blu neon quando è completamente carica su 1 polpastrello della zampa che mostra blu neon quando rimane solo il 25% di carica. L'aspetto, il peso, i milliampere-ora (mAh) di 10.000 quindi mantengono la carica più a lungo, la custodia da viaggio morbida per power bank, il cavo di ricarica USB-C e la confezione in cui è presentato e il costo ragionevole rendono sicuramente questo prodotto (per uso generale) uno migliore di molti altri più costosi che non vengono forniti con un cavo di ricarica e hanno meno mAh. Sono molto soddisfatta di questo acquisto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gebuik de powerbank voor VR Bril. Werkt prima

Necesitaba una batería para llevar en la mochila ya que viajo bastante en avión y a menudo mi teléfono y auriculares se quedaban secos, así que estuve probando una que tenía en casa más pequeña y antigua, pero tenía una capacidad de carga bastante limitada y enseguida se consumía. Me decidí por esta esperando que pudiera durar lo suficiente y que no se descargara demasiado rápido entre viajes, y la verdad es que me sorprendió. La capacidad es alta, te permite recargar sin problemas y le sobra para volver a hacerlo por lo menos otras tres o cuatro veces (aún no he llegado a comprobarlo porque no he tenido necesidad de agotarla, pero sí he recargado un par de veces y el indicador estaba por encima de la mitad de potencia), no es pesada y se adapta bien a un bolsillo pequeño en en la mochila, desde la cual puedo sacar el cable USB tipo C sin necesidad de extraerla del compartimento. Tiene hasta una pequeña linterna muy útil para buscar cosas en el fondo de la mochila, lo cual es otro extra. En general buena compra, funciona perfectamente y me resulta muy útil, aparte de que no es cara en absoluto.
